articles.author: Jeff Foust
articles.title: European governments and companies seek changes to georeturn - SpaceNews
articles.description: European government and industry officials say the policy of “georeturn” needs to be adjusted to make Europe’s launch industry more competitive.
articles.content: BREMEN, Germany European government and industry officials say the policy of georeturn, which guarantees nations receive contracts in proportion to their investments, needs to be adjusted, particular… [+3671 chars]

articles.title: Blast from the past: gamma-ray burst strikes Earth from distant exploding star - European Space Agency
articles.description: An enormous burst of gamma rays, detected by ESA’s Integral space telescope, has struck Earth. The blast caused a significant disturbance in our planet’s ionosphere. Such disturbances are usually associated with energetic particle events on the Sun but this o…
